Background:

By now all of you have collected some experience in writing an R package. How did that go? What were the difficulties? Have you got a story to share about a CRAN submission that went particularly well (or not)?

Write a blog post on your experience.

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.

Class posts:

  • My First R Package by Amy Crawford
  • My first R package by Chelsey Legacy
  • My first R package by Ryan Morgan
  • All the small things by Kiegan Rice
  • LittleChickens by Katie Will
